subject: Labor and Jobs
World Cup 2022 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Zahir Belounis, the French-Algerian player who had been unable to leave the emirate because of its labor laws, has been told he will finally be granted an exit visa.
snippet: Zahir Belounis, the French-Algerian player who had been unable to leave the emirate because of its labor laws, has been told he will finally be granted an exit visa.
